sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components" import { StyledContentTextInput, StyledTagInput, StyledLabelForm, StyledSectionInput, StyledSpanInput, StyledH1Input, StyledLabelLN } from "./StyledFormInputs"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Dropdown1To10 from "../Dropdown1To10"; import PositivityDropdown from '../PositivityDropdown'; import AgeDropdown from '../AgeDropdown'; import POVDropdown from '../POVDropdown'; import useStorage from "../useStorage"; import ApproveBtn from "./ApproveBtn"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; const obj = () => ({ id: 0, date: "", dreamContent: "", dreamName: "", emotionTags: [], peopleTags: [], placesTags: [], generalTags: [], isLucid: false, lucidClarity: null, lucidCohesion: null, lucidControl: null, isNightmare: false, nightmareIntensity: null, nightmareReaction: {fightBack: false, run: false, hide: false, freeze: false,}, positivityScore: null, personalScore: null, age: "", pov: "", isUnique: true, seriesName: "", situationIRL: "", prideScore: null, personalInterpretation: "", }) const StyledForm = styled.form` display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 8px; `; const StyledSpan4Radio = styled(StyledSpanInput)` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; @media (min-width: 768.1px){ flex-direction: row; } `; function AddADreamForm (){ const [addDreamFormState, setAddDreamFormState] = useState(obj()); const { updateStorage, exportToBrowser, dreams } = useStorage(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); updateStorage(addDreamFormState); console.log(addDreamFormState) setAddDreamFormState(obj()); exportToBrowser(); // navigate("/journal-page"); } useEffect(() => { console.log("Dreams state updated:", dreams); }, [dreams]); const id = dreams.length+1; return( Dream Content {setAddDreamFormState({ ...addDreamFormState, dreamContent: e.target.value, id: id, date: `${(new Date()).getDate()}/${(new Date()).getMonth()+1}/${((new Date()).getYear())-1}` }); }}/> What would be a good name for the dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, dreamName: e.target.value})}}/> What emotions have you experienced? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, emotionTags: e.target.value})}}/> Who was there in your dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, peopleTags: e.target.value})}}/> Where were you in the dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, placesTags: e.target.value})}}/> General Tags {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, generalTags: e.target.value})}}/> Lucid And Nightmare {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isLucid: e.target.value})}}/> Clarity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidClarity: e.target.value})}}/> Cohesion: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidCohesion: e.target.value})}} /> Control: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidControl: e.target.value})}}/> {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isNightmare: e.target.value})}}/> Intensity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareIntensity: e.target.value})}}/>

Reaction

{ setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, run: e.target.checked}})}}/> Run { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, fightBack: e.target.checked}})}}/> Fight Back { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, hide: e.target.checked}})}}/> Hide { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, freeze: e.target.checked}})}}/> Freeze Your Midnight Insight Positivity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, positivityScore: e.target.value})}}/> Personal Score: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, personalScore: e.target.value})}}/> Age {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, age: e.target.value})}}/> POV {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, pov: e.target.value})}}/>

Was it a unique dream?

{setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isUnique: e.target.checked})}}/> {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isUnique: !e.target.checked})}}/> Name The Series {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, seriesName: e.target.value})}}/> What Would've You Done In This Situation In real Life {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, situationIRL: e.target.value})}}/> Pride in actions? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, prideScore: e.target.value})}}/> Your interpretation, lessons learned from the dream + hidden or underlying messages {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, personalInterpretation: e.target.value})}}/> ) } export default AddADreamForm;
